article.headline: Alabama A&M 80, Southern 77
article.story: BATON ROUGE, La. (AP) -- Obie Trotter scored 19 points to help lead Alabama A&M to an 80-77 win over Southern University Monday night. Rick Ricketts added 18 points for the Bulldogs (14-10, 11-3 SWAC), including a 3-pointer with 4:14 remaining to put Alabama A&M ahead for good. Joseph Martin had 14. Deon Saunders led Southern (12-12, 9-6) with 17 points. Trayvean Scott added 15 and Chris Alexander had 12. Chris Alexander hit a free-throw with 2:44 remaining to bring Southern within one, 78-77. But the Jaguars turned the ball over twice in the remaining time and couldn't score again. Ricketts' layup with 26 seconds remaining provided the winning margin.
